item.title: Books
item.description: I am always on the lookout for recommendations, send me your number one book recommendation via email (see about page for contact details) please put [book recommendation] in the subject line. This is a page first and foremost for myself, to track what I have read, what I found good and what I want to read in the future. There is a mix of English and Dutch books, in most cases a translated version is available, use your google-fu to find itðŸ˜‰.
